addProfile()

addProfile(string $text, float $time, array $data, string $trace) : mixed

Adds a profile to the profiler.

Parameters

string $text

The text (typically an SQL query) being profiled.
float $time

The elapsed time in seconds.
array $data

The data that was used.
string $trace

An exception backtrace as a string.

Returns

mixed
